nodes.text: Jinata Security, also known as J-Sec, was a law enforcement agency based on the planet Vardos during the reign of the Galactic Empire. Several Jinata Security officers were present alongside the Aqualish Gleb when Iden Versio returned to her homeworld after being court-martialed for sedition. By 34 ABY, Protectorate Gleb ruled Vardos with the support of Jinata Security and the First Order. Jinata Security also supported Project Resurrection, a First Order initiative to create new stormtroopers using conscripted children. After Gleb was killed for her failures and Vardos was locked down by the First Order, J-Sec rebelled against their former allies.

During the time Project Resurrection was active, J-Sec mostly used severely outdated starships and vehicles. They used ground vehicles such as the AT-RT and AT-ST. They used starships such as Clone Wars-era ARC-170 starfighters and V-wing starfighters, Rebellion-era Lambda-class T-4a shuttles, modified GR-75 medium transports, at least one modified EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate and a pre-Clone Wars heavily modified Naboo N-1 starfighter. They also used BTL Y-wing starfighters painted in the livery of Jinata Security.
